response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I suggest we discuss a fair price that reflects both its worth and your needs. Considering its market value and your perceived benefit, I propose a price of $100 for this exceptional product.
